welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guadarrama, a charming city nestled in the heart of the Spanish mountains. Known for its stunning natural beauty and rich history, we are excited for you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, featuring modern facilities and a wide variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, currently undergoing renovations to update its facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Barajas Airport, featuring a spacious design and a variety of amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for some long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.
